EmailTemplate.name: PO In Process 1st Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: PO Status In Process Notification
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
To Whom It May Concern:
You are listed as the primary contact for {!PurchaseOrder_LineItem__c.SupplierNameLink__c}. Purchase Order {!PurchaseOrder_LineItem__c.PONameLink__c} is confirmed to be shipped on {!PurchaseOrder_LineItem__c.PO_Estimated_Ship_Date__c}. Please Reply All with confirmation that this PO is on schedule and will be shipped by {!PurchaseOrder_LineItem__c.Carrier__c} on {!PurchaseOrder_LineItem__c.PO_Estimated_Ship_Date__c}.
Thank you,
Team Phun Purchasing
